Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it could significantly benefit you. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a valuable item at a special discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
